TextView.android:text: Inst_3: If C3252 = 2 (No care given or sought) → C3351 Inst_4: If C3253 ≠ “Health provider” (Never took to a health provider) → C3387
Inst_7: If C3259, C3269, C3264 or C3274 = 1-4, 6-9 or 11 (seen at any health facility) → continue with C3281; Otherwise →C3287
Inst_8: If C3252 = 2 (No care given) or if C3253 ≠ “Health Provider” (Never took to a health provider) → C3351
